favourite.article: Beautiful, I heard this song for the first time the day that I was Baptized into the Church.
When I heard this song for the first time it really touches me and of course carry me through in all difficulties I faced.
It seems nice and blessing song I want to listen.
Thank so much for keeping this beautiful song.

I learned this song in the sunday school in India and after a long time heard this song again and left a deep connection to it in a way that God was so faithful to His promise in the song and has really carried me and my family through. I want to thank Him for reminding me that He is still there carrying me.

This is the first song I ever learned at international chriatian school at two years old in 86. This song got my daddy saved, got me to be a singer, and got me through high school. I hope it will get me saved keep me singing, get me through my dad's dead, the birth of my unborn child, and college. Thank you for having these lyrics.

Thank you so very much. This song has carried me through my whole life. I was an orphan. Thank You Jesus. I found my parent's I think my mom, but I've traveled from house to house my whole life with a broken heart. This is the first song I ever learned at two years old. I wish everybody knew this song. He heals my heart every time I believe in this song.
The song that means so much to me because it is so true!
Thank you I found it. I'm Jodi Pascual and I proudly represent my religion. I'm an adventist.
Thank you for the lyrics to one of my old time church songs. Wish these songs could be sang more often.
Thank you, thank you..... searched all over the web for this song and Praise God I found it on your site.
